Assets.DESCRIPTION[StarQ MiniTrackServic:
Single bi-directional track that can work as both passenger and cargo station as well as a train depo for two trains. 
Employees 10 workers, provide 6,000 tonnes of storage and two trucks for delivery.

Single bi-directional track that acts as a rail yard spawning 2 trains, employing 5 workers. 
Can be upgraded with additional tracks and maintenance upgrade.
Assets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION[StarQ MiniTra: Additional tracks for more trains. Same expense as placing a new one, but does not require separate road access.
A large maintenance upgrade with no visual change, halves the maintenance duration by employing 15 workers.
Assets.DESCRIPTION[StarQ MiniTrackServic:
Single bi-directional track that facilates passenger train with one stop, employing 3 workers. 
Can be upgraded with additional tracks and comfort upgrade.
Assets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION[StarQ MiniTra: Additional tracks for more passenger train stops. Same expense as placing a new one, but does not require separate road access.
A large comfort upgrade with no visual change, provides 60 comfort employing 7 workers but does require Telecommunication access.
Assets.DESCRIPTION[StarQ MiniTrackServic:
Single bi-directional track that facilates cargo transfer vehicles with one train stop, 12,000 tonnes of storage space and 4 trucks for delivery, employing 6 workers. 
Can be upgraded with additional tracks and additional storage.
Assets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION[StarQ MiniTra: Additional tracks for more cargo train stops. Same expense as placing a new one, but does not require separate road access.
A large storage upgrade with no visual change, provides 76,000 tonnes of storage space, 16 trucks and employing 30 workers.
